DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine placement , timing , associate complication , efficacy temporary tunnel catheter renal replacement therapy patient acute kidney injury .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Catheter Placement Renal Replacement Therapy Patients With Acute Kidney Injury
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study examine placement , timing , associate complication , efficacy temporary tunnel catheter renal replacement therapy patient acute kidney injury . In particular , assess renal replacement adequacy patient dialysis continuous veno-venous hemofiltration monitoring urea reduction ratio , venous arterial pressure . We also monitor infection rate . We compare outcomes patient receive tunneled catheter patient receive temporary catheter .
DOC.criteria: Patients admit hospital acute kidney injury require renal replacement therapy End stage renal disease Chronic kidney disease 5 progression end stage renal disease Outside hospital catheter placement
